2015-09-24-aim-design-development.__content: ## Website Design and Development in WordPress Working closely with the client, I designed this one-page scrolling website with parallax images. Then, after a few iterations and final approval, I worked on the front end development through WordPress. See below wireframes and final designs. You can visit the website here: assetim.com.au.
